tool_name: Placeholder text API for your application
tool_description: Use this api in your application wherever you need placeholder text
title: Placeholder text API for your application

api_list.name: Generate placeholder text
api_list.description: Generates placeholder text based on "length" query param

required_parameters.name: length
required_parameters.description:
Specifies what size placeholder text you want in the response.
The \"length\" param must be one of the following:
- small
- medium
- large
